name: LetterFireworks
description:
Letter Fireworks is a little game about fireworks on paper plane. Made for the Trijam#176 with the theme: "Loading process"

The blue bar represent the happyness off the people. It slowly decrease over time.

Hold the key on your keyboard corresponding to the letter on the screen to launch a fireworks. This wil increase a a little the hapiness of the people. Once the fireworks launched, you can release the key.

Tip: You will have to press multiple key at a same time, so use as many hands as possible ;-)

Made with Construct 2, Illustrator and Beepbox
